channel.title: Jekyll • Simple, blog-aware, static sites
channel.description: Transform your plain text into static websites and blogs.

image.description: Transform your plain text into static websites and blogs.
image.title: Jekyll • Simple, blog-aware, static sites

item.title: Ignat Avramov
item.description: Ignat is an MD/PhD scholar who studied health information systems at Oxford as a Rhodes Scholar. He has worked across the breadth of healthcare technology from designing novel hardware diagnostics at NASA to the implementation and evaluation of commercialized software platforms...

item.title: Xavier Muniain
item.description: Xavier is a family doctor with practice that covers the spectrum of healthcare. He works as a hospitalist, admitting patients in the acute care setting. He also shares a maternity practice and previously ran a community based clinic. He is currently the lead for quality improvement for his hospital based practice...

item.title: Roberto Antonelli
item.description: Jeeshan is an MD/PhD scholar who studied health information systems at Oxford as a Rhodes Scholar. He has worked across the breadth of healthcare technology from designing novel hardware diagnostics at NASA to the implementation and evaluation of commercialized software platforms...

item.title: Gregory Coupet
item.description: Trevor is a family doctor with practice that covers the spectrum of healthcare. He works as a hospitalist, admitting patients in the acute care setting. He also shares a maternity practice and previously ran a community based clinic. He is currently the lead for quality improvement for his hospital based practice...

item.title: Jeeshan Chowdhury
item.description: Sameer handles the product direction, visual design & user experience for unBundle. He has over 9 years of experience in designing web & mobile products, throughout his career he has worked with clients such as Samsung, GM, Finning Canada and many startups...

item.title: Dominic Savoie
item.description: Dominic is a software engineer who co-founded Enlight Health and Hacking Health. With Trevor and Jeeshan, he is using his technical and business expertise to improve access to healthcare with innovative web and mobile solutions. In his free time, likes to make MySQL asynchronous and chill with friends...

item.title: Trevor Chan
item.description: The tools available simply did not meet the needs of a busy clinical teaching team with an overflowing list of patients. That’s why we built Listrunner. Everything we’ve heard from tired residents and frustrated students, we’ve put into Listrunner.

item.title: Sameer Ahmed
item.description: We saw first hand how much time we weren’t spending on patients because we had to organize information instead of using it. As clinicians, we need to spend our time caring for our patients and teaching our learners.

item.title: Guest Posts
item.dc:creator: John Smith
item.description: If you want to create a guest post that will appear as if written by another author, simply add an author attribute to the YAML header of your blog post. This will be picked up in the template and displayed in the meta-section both on the front page as well as on the individual post pages.

item.title: Guest Posts
item.dc:creator: John Smith
item.description: If you want to create a guest post that will appear as if written by another author, simply add an author attribute to the YAML header of your blog post. This will be picked up in the template and displayed in the meta-section both on the front page as well as on the individual post pages.

item.title: Guest Posts
item.dc:creator: John Smith
item.description: If you want to create a guest post that will appear as if written by another author, simply add an author attribute to the YAML header of your blog post. This will be picked up in the template and displayed in the meta-section both on the front page as well as on the individual post pages.

item.title: Code Snippets
item.description:
Whenever you need to post a code snippet, use the liquid tags hilight and endhilight like this:

# some code goes here
puts "Hello World!"

Note that this only provides color-coding. For that you might need to use a front end colorization engine like Highlight.JS or something similar.

item.title: Code Snippets
item.description:
Whenever you need to post a code snippet, use the liquid tags hilight and endhilight like this:

# some code goes here
puts "Hello World!"

Note that this only provides color-coding. For that you might need to use a front end colorization engine like Highlight.JS or something similar.

item.title: Code Snippets
item.description:
Whenever you need to post a code snippet, use the liquid tags hilight and endhilight like this:

# some code goes here
puts "Hello World!"

Note that this only provides color-coding. For that you might need to use a front end colorization engine like Highlight.JS or something similar.

item.title: Using the Web Icons
item.description:
This template uses Typicons web font, provided by Fontello font bundling service. It allows you to quickly add nice icons into your pages by using css tags.

To add an icon somewhere in the template simply do:

<i class="icon-home"></i>

This will insert a home icon, just as the one seen in the sidebar. The available class names you can use are as follows:

These should work in all the browsers, all the way down to and including IE7, but not IE6.

item.title: Data Source Settings — New and Improved!
item.dc:creator: Natasha
item.description:
Hello World!

This is just a sample post.

Vestibulum imperdiet adipiscing arcu, quis aliquam dolor condimentum dapibus. Aliquam fermentum leo aliquet quam volutpat et molestie mauris mattis. Suspendisse semper consequat velit in suscipit. Praesent blandit, mi id facilisis adipiscing, tortor tellus mollis quam, sed dignissim sapien diam ac lectus. Nunc eget ornare quam. Vivamus sit amet tortor dolor, non egestas ligula. Mauris nisi risus, semper nec blandit id, suscipit eget dolor. Sed placerat odio at erat porttitor varius. Phasellus ornare vestibulum dolor ac rhoncus. Mauris laoreet varius est eu rhoncus. Curabitur facilisis mauris eu purus pharetra vitae tincidunt nulla gravida. Duis sagittis, felis a luctus mattis, metus sem tempus velit, sit amet blandit tellus nisi id augue.

Proin feugiat libero ac lorem mollis fermentum. Cras et lacus sodales nisl facilisis ornare. Sed dolor eros, pulvinar ac varius non, bibendum eget odio. Nulla facilisi. Pellentesque et nisi a tellus ullamcorper faucibus. Nullam sagittis tempor mi non mattis. Proin ultricies, enim sit amet bibendum tristique, ligula ante feugiat nunc, sit amet imperdiet tortor nisl et felis. Pellentesque et nisl dui, non dictum libero. Vivamus tempor ante ac leo suscipit a sodales ligula iaculis. Curabitur massa mi, semper sed bibendum eget, auctor in nulla. Quisque at mi in ligula viverra suscipit sed vitae leo.
